attributes.additional_details:
Maria Miller, culture secretary, has overclaimed£5800 of public money. Yet another example of corruption in the Houses of Parliament. Mp's are far too quick to criticise other professions but can't seem to get their own house in order.
How can Miller get away with a simple apology when she has committed what amounts to fraud?! The fact she made the investigation so long and drawn out just makes things worse.
Miller should do the decent thing and resign

rejection.details: This is a party political matter and not for Government
